name: Long-Shattered Vessel
description: Each and every fragment reflected from endless calamities is a seed of ruin harboring the will of destruction within.

skills.name: Mutual Sacrifice: Demise's Storm
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to one designated target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Mutual Sacrifice: Fading Fate
skills.description: Deals minor Physical DMG to all targets. Converts a portion of the hit target's reduced HP to <u>"Corrosion"</u>.

skills.name: Prayers For Me
skills.description: Resists Crowd Control debuffs. When "???" uses "Demise's Storm" or "Fading Fate" again and if this unit was summoned by that attack type, then this unit will attack alongside "???." This unit is then absorbed by "???," restoring the HP that was converted to "<u>Entangled By Agony,</u>" and granting "<u>Calamity Power</u>" to "???."

skills.name: Libations For Me
skills.description: After receiving a killing blow, if the number of "<u>Calamity Power</u>" stacks on "???" is not 0, this unit is immediately resummoned. However, "???" will lose 1 stack of "<u>Calamity Power</u>" and a certain percentage of HP. When "???" uses "Cry Not For The Discarded," this unit will be absorbed and the HP that was converted to "<u>Entangled By Agony</u>" will be restored.
